addFilter(com.google.android.gms.drive.q.Description: Adds a search filter to the query. If more than one filter is added, they are combined with a logical AND. Skips MatchAllFilter.

setPageToken(java.lang.String).Description: Set the page token to retrieve the next page of results.

Query.Builder(com.google.android.gms.dri.Description: Creates a new builder with initial values from an existing query.

Parameters: the order to be used to sort the query results
setSortOrder(com.google.android.gms.driv.Description: Sets the @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#query#SortOrder_E@ to be used to sort the query results. Use @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#query#SortOrder#Builder_E@ to build the sort order as required. Multiple calls to this method resets the sort order set in previous calls.
